title: Decolonizing artificial intelligence: Rethinking global health futures

content: Artificial intelligence has become key to healthcare delivery and disease surveillance, but new research warns that its design and deployment risk reinforcing colonial-era inequities. Jarrel De Matas of the University of Texas Medical Branch argues t... [4730 chars]

title: From energy hog to grid optimizer: The paradox of artificial intelligence
description: AI is equally a potential enabler of sustainable energy systems. Large language models can process vast quantities of structured and unstructured data, supporting operators in load forecasting, market analysis, and incident response. By making sense of complex datasets, AI can improve energy efficiency at both system and asset levels.
content: The surge of artificial intelligence is reshaping industries worldwide, but its energy footprint is raising alarms. A new paper examines the paradox of large language models, which consume enormous amounts of electricity while simultaneously offering... [4285 chars]

title: ASML becomes Mistral AI’s top shareholder after leading latest funding round, sources say
description: ASML is set to become the top shareholder of French artificial intelligence startup Mistral AI in a move to strengthen European tech sovereignty, people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
content:
ASML, a crucial supplier of advanced chipmaking equipment, is set to become the top shareholder of French artificial intelligence startup Mistral AI in a move to strengthen European tech sovereignty, people familiar with the matter told Reuters.

title: Chinese Stocks: Balancing Act Between AI and Consumer Staples
description: China's stock market showed little movement as investors balanced gains in consumer staples against losses in artificial intelligence shares. Despite significant declines in some high-growth sectors, consumer staples and property shares saw increases as market analysts evaluate potential impacts of new regulatory measures.
content:
Chinese stocks experienced stagnation on Monday, with consumer staples offsetting declines in artificial intelligence stocks, as investors shifted away from high-growth sectors.
The Hang Seng Index rose marginally by 0.4%, while China's blue-chip CSI... [343 chars]

title: Alibaba Leads $140 Million Funding Round In X Square Robot
description: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. co-led the latest funding round in robotics startup X Square Robot, as the Chinese e-commerce company is trying to cement its leadership in emerging technologies. The Hangzhou-based company has said it plans to spend $53 billion on AI infrastructure over three years in a major pivot. Artificial intelligence advancements promise to usher in a new generation of smarter robotics, and Beijing has made developing that sector a national priority.
content:
Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. co-led the latest funding round in robotics startup X Square Robot, as the Chinese e-commerce company is trying to cement its leadership in emerging technologies.

title: SP launches “Empowering Education through Digital Panel with AI”
description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Sept 7: Study Point (SP), a renowned education institute launched its first-ever “Empowering Education through Digital Panel with Artificial Intelligence”, here today. The initiative was formally introduced by Neeraj Mahajan, Managing Director, Study Point, who provided a detailed overview of how this Smart Education System will revolutionize learning by integrating Artificial Intelligence with digital tools, thereby enhancing the teaching-learning experience. The launching event was graced by Rakesh Koul, former Sarpanch and noted social activist, who was the […]

title: International Day of Police Cooperation: UN calls for harnessing innovation to foster community
description: Artificial intelligence and digital technologies are transforming every aspect of our lives - including policing, said UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres on the third International Day of Police Cooperation, observed on September 7 every year.
